title: DNS Records for a Zone

links.title: List DNS Records
links.description: List, search, sort, and filter a zones' DNS records.

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: DNS record content

proxied.description: DNS record proxied status

per_page.description: Number of DNS records per page

match.description: Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)

links.title: Create DNS Record
links.description: Create a new DNS record for a zone. See the record object definitions for required attributes for each record type

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: DNS record content

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

priority.description: Required for MX, SRV and URI records; unused by other record types. Records with lower priorities are preferred

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: DNS record content

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: DNS record content

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

links.title: Scan DNS Records
links.description: Scan for common DNS records on your domain and automatically add them to your zone. Useful if you haven't updated your nameservers yet.

links.title: Import DNS Records
links.description: You can upload your [BIND config](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zone_file "Zone file") through this endpoint. It assumes that cURL is called from a location with bind_config.txt (valid BIND config) present.

proxied.description: Whether or not proxiable records should receive the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

links.title: Export DNS Records
links.description: You can export your [BIND config](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zone_file "Zone file") through this endpoint.

cfLinkErrors.1003: per_page must be a positive integer
cfLinkErrors.1011: Zone file for '<domain name>' could not be found
cfLinkErrors.1012: Zone file for '<domain name>' is not modifiable
cfLinkErrors.1013: The record could not be found
cfLinkErrors.1014: You do not have permission to modify this zone
cfLinkErrors.1017: Content for A record is invalid. Must be a valid IPv4 address
cfLinkErrors.1018: Content for AAAA record is invalid. Must be a valid IPv6 address
cfLinkErrors.1019: Content for CNAME record is invalid
cfLinkErrors.1024: Invalid priority, priority must be set and be between 0 and 65535
cfLinkErrors.1025: Invalid content for an MX record
cfLinkErrors.1028: Invalid service value. Must be less than 100 characters
cfLinkErrors.1030: Invalid protocol value. Must be less than 12 characters
cfLinkErrors.1032: Invalid SRV name. Must be less than 90 characters
cfLinkErrors.1033: Invalid weight value. Must be between 0 and 65,535
cfLinkErrors.1034: Invalid port value. Must be between 0 and 65,535
cfLinkErrors.1037: Invalid domain name for a SRV target host
cfLinkErrors.1039: Invalid TTL. Must be between 60 and 86400 seconds, or 1 for automatic
cfLinkErrors.1041: Priority must be set for SRV record
cfLinkErrors.1042: Zone file for '<domain name>' could not be found
cfLinkErrors.1043: Zone file for '<domain name>' is not editable
cfLinkErrors.1044: A record with these exact values already exists. Please modify or remove this record
cfLinkErrors.1045: The record could not be found
cfLinkErrors.1046: A record with these exact values already exists. Please modify or cancel this edit
cfLinkErrors.1047: You do not have permission to modify this zone
cfLinkErrors.1048: You have reached the record limit for this zone
cfLinkErrors.1052: You can not point a CNAME to itself
cfLinkErrors.1053: Invalid lat_degrees, must be an integer between 0 and 90 inclusive
cfLinkErrors.1054: Invalid lat_minutes, must be an integer between 0 and 59 inclusive
cfLinkErrors.1055: Invalid lat_seconds, must be a floating point number between 0 and 60, including 0 but not including 60
cfLinkErrors.1056: Invalid or missing lat_direction. Values must be N or S
cfLinkErrors.1057: Invalid long_degrees, must be an integer between 0 and 180
cfLinkErrors.1058: Invalid long_minutes, must be an integer between 0 and 59
cfLinkErrors.1059: Invalid long_seconds, must be a floating point number between 0 and 60, including 0 but not including 60
cfLinkErrors.1060: Invalid or missing long_direction. Values must be E or S
cfLinkErrors.1061: Invalid altitude, must be a floating point number between -100000.00 and 42849672.95
cfLinkErrors.1062: Invalid size, must be a floating point number between 0 and 90000000.00
cfLinkErrors.1063: Invalid precision_horz, must be a floating point number between 0 and 90000000.00
cfLinkErrors.1064: Invalid precision_vert, must be a floating point number between 0 and 90000000.00
cfLinkErrors.1065: Invalid or missing data for <type> record
cfLinkErrors.1067: Invalid content for a NS record
cfLinkErrors.1068: Target cannot be an IP address
cfLinkErrors.1070: CNAME content cannot be an IP
cfLinkErrors.1071: Invalid proxied mode. Record cannot be proxied
cfLinkErrors.1073: Invalid TXT record. Must be less than 255 characters
cfLinkErrors.1074: Invalid TXT record. Record may only contain printable ASCII!

cfSectionNotes: If a zone's cname_setup_status is TRUE, you may only add A/AAAA and CNAME records for that zone
When adding a CNAME record, it will not be added if there is an A or AAAA record with the same name
When adding a A or AAAA record, it will not be added if there is an CNAME record with the same name
A CNAME record's name may not match it's content
You cannot add an NS record with the same name as any other record type
You cannot add a record with the same name as any NS record
Cloudflare will not begin serving DNS for a zone until the zone's nameservers are switched to Cloudflare nameservers at the zone's registrar
DNS will continue to be served by Cloudflare for 20 days after a zone's nameservers are switched away from Cloudflare namservers
When using unicode characters in domain names, they will be translated to punycode and as such, the length may end up being larger than what is passed into the API

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: A valid IPv4 address

proxiable.description: Whether the record can be proxied by Cloudflare or not

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

locked.description: Whether this record can be modified/deleted (true means it's managed by Cloudflare)

modified_on.description: When the record was last modified

auto_added.description: Will exist if Cloudflare automatically added this DNS record during initial setup.

meta.description: Extra Cloudflare-specific information about the record

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: A valid IPv6 address

proxiable.description: Whether the record can be proxied by Cloudflare or not

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

locked.description: Whether this record can be modified/deleted (true means it's managed by Cloudflare)

modified_on.description: When the record was last modified

auto_added.description: Will exist if Cloudflare automatically added this DNS record during initial setup.

meta.description: Extra Cloudflare-specific information about the record

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: A valid hostname

proxiable.description: Whether the record can be proxied by Cloudflare or not

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

locked.description: Whether this record can be modified/deleted (true means it's managed by Cloudflare)

modified_on.description: When the record was last modified

auto_added.description: Will exist if Cloudflare automatically added this DNS record during initial setup.

meta.description: Extra Cloudflare-specific information about the record

name.description: DNS record name (or @ for the zone apex)

content.description: Formatted HTTPS content. See 'data' to set HTTPS properties

proxiable.description: Whether the record can be proxied by Cloudflare or not

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

locked.description: Whether this record can be modified/deleted (true means it's managed by Cloudflare)

modified_on.description: When the record was last modified

auto_added.description: Will exist if Cloudflare automatically added this DNS record during initial setup.

meta.description: Extra Cloudflare-specific information about the record

objects.example:
{
  "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59",
  "type": "HTTPS",
  "name": "example.com",
  "proxiable": true,
  "proxied": false,
  "ttl": 3600,
  "locked": false,
  "zone_id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
  "zone_name": "example.com",
  "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "data": {
    "priority": 1,
    "target": ".",
    "value": "alpn=\"h3,h2\" ipv4hint=\"127.0.0.1\" ipv6hint=\"::1\""
  },
  "meta": {
    "auto_added": true,
    "source": "primary"
  }
}

objects.example:
{
  "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59",
  "type": "LOC",
  "name": "example.com",
  "content": "IN LOC 37 46 46 N 122 23 35 W 0m 100m 0m 0m",
  "proxiable": true,
  "proxied": false,
  "ttl": 3600,
  "locked": false,
  "zone_id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
  "zone_name": "example.com",
  "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "data": {
    "lat_degrees": 37,
    "lat_minutes": 46,
    "lat_seconds": 46,
    "lat_direction": "N",
    "long_degrees": 122,
    "long_minutes": 23,
    "long_seconds": 35,
    "long_direction": "W",
    "altitude": 0,
    "size": 100,
    "precision_horz": 0,
    "precision_vert": 0
  },
  "meta": {
    "auto_added": true,
    "source": "primary"
  }
}
objects.title: LOC Record

name.description: Service, protocol, and SRV name content. See 'data' for setting the individual component values

content.description: Priority, weight, port, and SRV target. See 'data' for setting the individual component values

proxiable.description: Whether the record can be proxied by Cloudflare or not

proxied.description: Whether the record is receiving the performance and security benefits of Cloudflare

ttl.description: Time to live, in seconds, of the DNS record. Must be between 60 and 86400, or 1 for 'automatic'

locked.description: Whether this record can be modified/deleted (true means it's managed by Cloudflare)

modified_on.description: When the record was last modified

service.description: A service type, prefixed with an underscore

name.description: A valid hostname

priority.description: Required for MX, SRV and URI records; unused by other record types. Records with lower priorities are preferred

auto_added.description: Will exist if Cloudflare automatically added this DNS record during initial setup.

meta.description: Extra Cloudflare-specific information about the record

objects.example:
{
  "id": "372e67954025e0ba6aaa6d586b9e0b59",
  "type": "SRV",
  "name": "_sip._tcp.example.com",
  "content": "10 IN SRV 5 8806 example.com.",
  "proxiable": true,
  "proxied": false,
  "ttl": 3600,
  "locked": false,
  "zone_id": "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353",
  "zone_name": "example.com",
  "created_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "modified_on": "2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z",
  "data": {
    "service": "_sip",
    "proto": "_tcp",
    "name": "example.com",
    "priority": 10,
    "weight": 5,
    "port": 8806,
    "target": "example.com"
  },
  "meta": {
    "auto_added": true,
    "source": "primary"
  }
}
